subject: Doping (Sports)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The prominent Italian rider Franco Pellizotti was barred from the Giro d’Italia after his biological passport showed irregularities that indicate doping.
snippet: The prominent Italian rider Franco Pellizotti was barred from the Giro d’Italia after his biological passport showed irregularities that indicate doping.
